channel.title: [317][Delta]Command Help[Delta][317]
channel.description:
I'm trying to make a command, I want it to teleblock someone for 10minutes, How do i do that?
All help is much appreciated.

item.title: [317][Delta]Command Help[Delta][317]
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

Problem Solved, Can be locked!

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Delta]Command Help[Delta][317]
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("urblocked") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.sM("You have been Tele Blocked by "+playerName+"."); itTeleblocks = true; sM("You've Tele Blocked "+p.playerName+"."); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Take a look at this part.

itTeleblocks = true;

Your server probably has a different name for it. Change it if it does.

Read full topic
